original: <color=#FFE787>使用限制：</color><color=#ccffcc>所有場合皆可使用</color>    降低敵方 <color=#ccffcc>150</color> 點士氣，並且提升我方所有建物 <color=#ccffcc>+35%</color> 抗性，持續 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4932)@</color> 秒。
text: <color=#FFE787>Restrictions on use: </color><color=#ccffcc>Can be used in all occasions</color> Reduce enemy <color=#ccffcc>150</color> A little morale, and boost me All the buildings of the party are <color=#ccffcc>+35%</color> resistant for <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4932)@</color> seconds.
